titleStmt.title: The divine will considered in its eternal decrees, and holy execution of them. By Edward Polhill of Burwash in Sussex Esquire
titleStmt.author: Polhill, Edward, 1622-1694?
Owen, John, 1616-1683.
Seaman, Lazarus, d. 1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Thomas Shelmerdine, at the sign of the Rose-Tree in Little-Britain,

notesStmt.note: With prefaces signed by John Owen and Lazarus Seaman.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of the 1673 edition.
Imperfect: copy catalogued misbound; pp.321-336 are misbound before pp.305-320.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Rose-Tree in Little-Britain
